original_text: On that same day, Abraham circumcised Ishmael and every male person in his house. He circumcised every male servant that was born in his house, as well as those that he had bought with money. He did this in the way that God had told him.
korean_text: 이에 아브라함이 하나님이 자기에게 말씀하신 대로 이 날에 그 아들 이스마엘과 집에서 태어난 모든 자와 돈으로 산 모든 자 곧 아브라함의 집 사람 중 모든 남자를 데려다가 그 포피를 베었으니

sentences.original_text: and every male person in his house
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 집에 있는 모든 남자에게도 할례를 행했다
그는 모든 남자 종에게 할례를 행했다

sentences.original_text: that was born in his house
as well as those that he had bought with money
in the way that God had told him
